subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mathieu Garon made three stops in the shootout and the 18-year-old rookie Sam Gagner scored the shootout’s only goal as Edmonton defeated the visiting Rangers, 3-2, on Saturday night.
snippet: Mathieu Garon made three stops in the shootout and the 18-year-old rookie Sam Gagner scored the shootout’s only goal as Edmonton defeated the visiting Rangers, 3-2, on Saturday night.
